channel.title: Runnin' error
channel.description:
When i compile my server i get no errors, however when i run this comes up [code]Starting server on port 43594:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:117) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:30)[/code]
What should i do?

item.title: Runnin' error
item.dc:creator: @Sexii_Jadii Sexii Jadii
item.description:
@Sexii_Jadii wrote:

Actually there was a tut on silabsoft for 100% runescape shops and due to my project i just thought i’d use it… Now i wish i had just made my own…

Read full topic

item.title: Runnin' error
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You used spaces, you’re supposed to use tabs.

Read full topic

item.title: Runnin' error
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Look in shops.cfg and find something dealing with a space, or a “1”. I’m not really good at understanding the runserver errors. ^^" Half the time.

Read full topic
